review_text: I bought this for my elderly mother and she loves it!  It's working wonderfuly and making some fantastic ice cream.  She can see it make the ice cream from the top.  I'm sure it would be fun for kids to watch as well.  No problems at all with it.  Everyone should have one of these.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
